project.name: C-C124C-WIRE-07-ST03-DT06-DF16-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C124C-WIRE-07-ST03-DT06-DF16-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C124C-WIRE-07-ST03-DT06-DF16-CF01-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_KF26ftrAgv88a7ccTFGY AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_KVATEz0gUd OR segfault_code_zKpmK1MVg2 OR segfault_code_XjY0HbeadG OR segfault_code_qOZMgfFu7P OR segfault_code_0voeRg7MGR OR segfault_msg_8xzPdx7iaf OR illegal_inst_msg_PE0FmjT7Je) AND NOT timeout_IETMEhRUII) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_KVATEz0gUd OR segfault_code_zKpmK1MVg2 OR segfault_code_XjY0HbeadG OR segfault_code_qOZMgfFu7P OR segfault_code_0voeRg7MGR OR segfault_msg_8xzPdx7iaf OR illegal_inst_msg_PE0FmjT7Je) OR timeout_IETMEhRUII OR controlled_exit_5YFVAixk2V)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_KVATEz0gUd OR segfault_code_zKpmK1MVg2 OR segfault_code_XjY0HbeadG OR segfault_code_qOZMgfFu7P OR segfault_code_0voeRg7MGR OR segfault_msg_8xzPdx7iaf OR illegal_inst_msg_PE0FmjT7Je) AND NOT timeout_IETMEhRUII) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_KVATEz0gUd OR segfault_code_zKpmK1MVg2 OR segfault_code_XjY0HbeadG OR segfault_code_qOZMgfFu7P OR segfault_code_0voeRg7MGR OR segfault_msg_8xzPdx7iaf OR illegal_inst_msg_PE0FmjT7Je) OR timeout_IETMEhRUII OR controlled_exit_5YFVAixk2V))
